Link¶

class Link.Link(name, engine)¶

Bases: PyQt5.QtCore.QObject

This class bridges the gap between device-facing code (written in Python and independent of the GUI) and user-facing code (written in QML and independent of the device).

__init__(name, engine)¶

Initializes the link and registers with the given name inside the QML engine.

_append_listModel(name, value, device)¶

Appends a device to the DeviceBrowser ListModel.

_call_device_function(device, func)¶

Allows QML-instantiated function calls on a target child device.

_list_args(device, function)¶

Displays docstring and args for the targeted device and function.

_list_methods(name)¶

Populates the QML FunctionBrowser for the targeted device.

_populate_listModel()¶

Populates the gui DeviceBrowser. Specialized codes are sent to allow different Devices to display different options.

_refresh(target)¶

Attempts to reconnect to the target child device.

_retrieve_handles(item='Sidebar')¶

Retrieve handle for appropriate element. For example, the GUI element for the coils is called coilElement and is a child of the ApplicationWindow.

_set_param(target, value, device, update_device=True)¶

Allows QML-instantiated param updates pushed to target device.

engine = None¶

Register the object in the context of QML

property1¶

Placeholder illustrating getter methods.
